original_text: All that were numbered in the camp of Judah were an hundred thousand and fourscore thousand and six thousand and four hundred, throughout their armies. These shall first set forth.
korean_text: 유다 진영에 속한 군대로 계수된 군인의 총계는 십팔만 육천사백 명이라 그들은 제일대로 행진할지니라

sentences.original_text: All that were numbered in the camp of Judah
were an hundred thousand and fourscore thousand
and six thousand and four hundred
